package.name: Contact_Vcard_Parse
package.description: Allows you to parse vCard files and text blocks, and get back an array of the elements of each vCard in the file or text.

release.notes: All returned values are now at equal "depth" in the returned array to match the upcoming Contact_Vcard_Build class; see new documentation at http://ciaweb.net/free/contact_vcard_parse for outline. Shortened array key names for N and ADR datatypes (e.g., "given_name" is now "given"). Line unfolding now only replaces the first leading whitespace character on folded lines, not all leading whitespace.
